item.title: Beogram 4000: Zero Force Balancing and Tracking Force Calibration
item.description:
The Beogram 4000 I’m currently restoring is almost ready for its initial test run. It’s time to fine-tune the zero force balance and set the appropriate tracking force. I documented this process in a video on my YouTube channel, featuring a Beogram 4002. You can find the video and my entire Beogram 4000 playlist through the provided links. Let me share some observations from this specific Beogram 4000 restoration. The first stage involves achieving zero force balance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/beogram-4000-zero-force-balancing-and-tracking-force-calibration/
